title: The Isa
creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Andrew J. Helgeson and Cinesound
brief_description: A documentary about Mt Isa produced in 1969. The Isa, 30 minutes. Produced for the Mt. Isa Mines Ltd. Mt. Isa mine and city as seen by business men, tourists and residents enjoying life in this new and ever developing mining city in Northern Queensland.
creator_credit_for_label: Eric Fullilove, Andrew J. Helgeson and Cinesound
